lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick followed Roger Federer out of the Rogers Cup after he was upset by 44th-ranked Marin Cilic, 6-4, 4-6, 6-4, Thursday in Toronto. Fourth-seeded Nikolay Davydenko became the latest upset victim when he dropped a 4-6, 6-4, 6-4 decision to Nicolas Kiefer.
